      Fetch a single piece of content.
      Content ConfluenceClient.postContent(Content content)

      void ConfluenceAPI.postContentWithCallback(Content content, retrofit2.Callback<Content> callback)
      Same as ConfluenceAPI.postContent(com.github.lucapino.confluence.model.Content) but clients can provide a callback with success and failure hooks.
